The first slides was my first project. I had to create a website with four linked page for to be able to be taken in my school program. I used HTML and CSS.

The next slides was my first project with a crud. I had to create a website for where you can be able to crud a cinema database. I used PHP, MySQL,JavaScript and CSS.

The last slides is a Connect 4. I had to reproduice a Connect4. I used HTML, JavaScript and CSS.
